genres.name: New Jack Swing
genres.description: Fusion of R&B, hip hop, and dance-pop

genres.name: Quiet Storm
genres.description: Smooth, mellow R&B for late-night listening

genres.name: Neo-Soul
genres.description: Soulful R&B with jazz and funk influences

grooveTypes.name: Swing
grooveTypes.description: Jazzy swing feel with triplet subdivisions

mockLibraryData.title: Beaver Creek
mockLibraryData.style: layered harmonies, slow jam, warm bassline, 70 bpm; soft electric piano, male vocals, ambient, and gentle percussion for a sensual groove, smooth ambient, slow
mockLibraryData.lyrics:
Drifting through the night
Like a river flowing free
Beaver Creek, your melody
Carries me away

In the moonlight's glow
I can hear your gentle song
Whispering secrets
That have been hidden for so long

Let the music take you
To a place where dreams come true
Beaver Creek, I'm listening
To the rhythm of you

mockLibraryData.title: Midnight Groove
mockLibraryData.style: smooth electric piano, male vocals, contemporary r&b, and gentle percussion for a sensual groove, smooth r&b, slow
mockLibraryData.lyrics:
Midnight calls my name
In the rhythm of the rain
Every beat, every note
Makes my heart float

Grooving through the night
With the stars shining bright
This melody, this groove
Is all I need to move

Let the music guide you
Through the darkness of the night
Midnight Groove, keep playing
Until the morning light

mockLibraryData.title: Smooth Operator
mockLibraryData.style: neo-soul grooves, warm bassline, 85 bpm; rhodes piano, male vocals, neo-soul, and funky drums for a sensual groove, smooth neo-soul, medium tempo
mockLibraryData.lyrics:
Smooth operator, that's what you are
Moving through the night like a shooting star
Every step you take, every move you make
Got me hypnotized, I can't escape

You're the rhythm in my soul
Making my heart whole
Smooth operator, take control
Of this love that's taking hold

Let the groove flow through you
Like the wind through the trees
Smooth operator, you're the key
To unlock this melody

mockLibraryData.title: Late Night Vibes
mockLibraryData.style: quiet storm atmosphere, slow jam, warm bassline, 65 bpm; soft electric piano, male vocals, quiet storm, and gentle percussion for a romantic groove, smooth quiet storm, slow
mockLibraryData.lyrics:
Late night vibes, they call my name
In the silence, I feel no shame
Every whisper, every sigh
Makes me want to fly

In the darkness, I find my way
Through the music, I'll always stay
Late night vibes, you're my guide
In this journey, side by side

Let the night embrace you
With its gentle, loving touch
Late night vibes, I need you so much
To heal this heart that's been broken

mockLibraryData.title: Funky Fresh
mockLibraryData.style: new jack swing beats, funky bassline, 95 bpm; electric piano, male vocals, new jack swing, and electronic drums for an energetic groove, funky new jack swing, fast
mockLibraryData.lyrics:
Funky fresh, that's the way I feel
Every time I hear this rhythm, it's so real
Got the groove, got the flow
Watch me as I go

Moving to the beat, feeling so alive
This music makes my spirit thrive
Funky fresh, you're the one
Making my heart run

Let the rhythm take you higher
To a place where dreams come true
Funky fresh, I'm feeling you
In everything you do
